title: Pro's Club
body:
Looking for people to join our club, (pref plat and up) I am a d3 smurf myself. We like to mess around a lot in normal games trying new strategies but will be doing some flexing also once we reach a good amount of members that play the game on regular basis. Super Friendly and Fun, hola at me for an add if you are interested <3
oh almost forgot the club tag is "Ak47*" just cause the owner of the club is Russian
